rules_text:
When Rehengi Battle Priest enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Rehengi Battle Priest leaves the battlefield.
At the beginning of your end step, if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn, conscript a Rebel. [i](Look at the top four cards of your library. Reveal a Rebel from them and put it into your hand or create a 1/1 Rebel token. Put the rest on the bottom.)[/i]
